data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=7q-qmfSNcJcQ7kNvgFuOZIL&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBD8tUiwQL8oau6MMCmf2kduUXJPc9fdKTmO96sA_hDGA&oe=6675780C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ViNOcbK8OHIQ7kNvgFAdEIp&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBw7T8qD8_kY92t_3L34Vud0gOebeLUzmh_MnQXznB5Tg&oe=6675761F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=goc4aj0_N74Q7kNvgGBUh_m&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDUYJNQQR2GoS3o_d8hWnW-T0KN9i-p8iPenYWDoVD99w&oe=66755B71)
